alert.note: Alert for Adair (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 11:23PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Madison, northern Crawford, Washington and Adair Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1121 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms from Hindsville to Fayetteville to Stilwell, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Stilwell... Huntsville... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Elkins... West Fork... Lincoln... Westville... Greenland... Winslow... St. Paul... Hindsville... Wesley... Adair State Park... Saint Paul... Cincinnati... Maryetta... Withrow Springs State Park... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 39 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
